description: This file defines a Dart class 'SecureStorage' that provides an interface for securely storing, retrieving, and deleting sensitive data such as JWT tokens and user IDs using the Flutter Secure Storage package.

classes.name: SecureStorage
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to handle secure storage of sensitive data like JWT tokens and user IDs using the Flutter Secure Storage plugin.

methods.name: saveToken
methods.description: Saves a JWT token securely in storage.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: deleteToken
methods.description: Deletes the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.description: Clears all stored data in secure storage.
